What are the treatments for intranuclear rod myopathy ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of intranuclear rod myopathy:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Nemaline myopathy 3   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation
